articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Grimes says anyone can use her voice for AI-generated songs - BBC
articles.description: The pop singer invites creators to generate new music using software trained on her voice.
articles.content:
Grimes has invited musicians to clone her voice using Artificial Intelligence in order to create new songs.
The pop singer, whose real name is Claire Boucher, said she would "split 50% royalties on … [+4483 chars]
